text: == Events == * The Great Famine of 1315-1317. == Births == * Michael 2nd Baron Poynings, Knight (d. 1369) == Deaths == * February 7 – Robert, Count of Clermont, French founder of the House of Bourbon (born 1256) * February 14 – Marguerite of France, queen of Edward I of England (born 1282) * date unknown ** William de Ros, 2nd Baron de Ros, an heir to the King of Scotland (born 1255) ** Ramkhamhaeng the Great, King of Sukhothai (born 1239) ** Madhvacharya, saint (born 1238)
